ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] I hate Shadows of Luclin and I don't even own it 	yet...
ygData.msgSnippet: DAoC is lame.. Sorry it wont take any market.. ... From: Amy Williams [mailto:amy_e_williams@hotmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, December 11, 2001 11:04 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
DAoC is lame.. Sorry it wont take any market..

-----Original Message-----
From: Amy Williams [mailto:amy_e_williams@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 11, 2001 11:04 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] I hate Shadows of Luclin and I don't even own it
yet...



My internet connection sucks SOOOO bad, that after doing a system restore
and reinstalling eq, I haven't been able to experience the SoL probs, I got
my own...

All I gotta say is.... DAoC - no probs for me so far(I was able to download
the patches just fine with the crappy internet connection), where as eq has
been nothing but probs for the year (1 year on xmas hehe) that I've been
TRYING to play /sigh.

Verant better get its act in gear, cause with DAoC out and running well,
they can't afford to lose the customer base that I'm predicting.

Amy
